ValidationRule.description: Users can't edit the Status or Owner of an internal ticket unless they are the owner or have the internal ticket permission set
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.DeveloperName = "Case_Internal_Ticket_Record_Type" && $User.Id <> OwnerId && NOT( $Permission.Internal_Ticket_Ops_User ) && OR( ISCHANGED(Status), ISCHANGED(OwnerId) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have the level of permissions to change the Case Status or change the Case Owner
